resources.string: \"Partially learned words\" means nouns that have been answered correctly at least once, but not enough times (5 times in a row) to be removed as \"fully learned\". If they are answered wrong before achieving the \"fully learned\" status, they are reset back to \"not learned\".

\"Fully learned words\" means nouns that have been answered correctly 5 times in a row. They are then considered \"fully learned\" and don\'t appear anymore in the practice screen. The ultimate goal should be to \"fully learn\" all nouns.
